data.meta_site_name: Carolina Theatre | Greensboro, NC | Local Shows and Events
data.text:
The dazzling adaptation of the hit Broadway musical about three black soul singers who form the music trio, the Dreamettes. But when an ambitious manager spots their act at a talent show, he offers them chance of a lifetime that leads to him taking creative control of the group and pushing the singers into the spotlight. As one becomes the star, another is forced out of the group, as all three women must learn the high cost of fame.

Directed by Bill Condon ‧ PG-13 ‧ 2006 ‧ Musical/Drama ‧ 2h 10m

Summer Film Fest tickets are $8, taxes and fees included.

Seniors, military, first responders, students & educators save $1 per ticket!

Carolina Theatre Movie passes will also be accepted at door.

Doors and Box Office will open at 6:15pm.
